Title: Limits the off label use of antipsychotic drugs on elderly patients with dementia
Summary: Limits the off label use of antipsychotic drugs with black box warnings on elderly patients with dementia; provides for professional misconduct for any health care professional who uses such drug on such patient.
LawCode: Add ยง280-d, Pub Health L; amd ยง6530, Ed L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to limiting the off label use of antipsychotic drugs with black box warnings on elderly patients with dementia; and to amend the education law, in relation to professional medical misconduct
